OOC: im on my friends comouter so if the font is a little odd, forgive me. 
also, i want to apologise for not RPing for the last few days. i have been 
very busy with activities.

::: Hell Beast looks to Zardus ::: So, shall we depart for the Maximal base 
now ?

::: Marine and Megatron glare at each other from across the room. :::

::: Marine ::: Yes, when can we leave? Should we send a message that were 
coming?

~~~~~~~

::: Gremlin, Transanulas, Black Aracnia, Pheniox, and Jackle maintain the 
watch on the bridge. After the little scuffle with Quickstrike, they went to 
repair the damage. :::

::: Gremlin ::: I just got word from Hell Beast, we are going to team up with 
the Maximals!??

::: Black Aracnia ::: What?! Whats the point of that?

::: Gremlin ::: Well, orders are orders. So for now we'll have to follow them.
